Ah, but you underestimate some Saitou fans' obsessions.  ;-)  If I 
had the money right now, I'd go after it.  Thanks for the 
information... filing it away for the future.

phil (the obsessed)

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "tatchan1024" <tatchan1024@y...> wrote:
> I got some time to check, and Saito makes his cameo appearance in 
the 
> anime in Episode 19 ("Yuke! Yuke! Toccha Nippon Ichi!") and in the 
> manga, he appears in Volume 2, page 234-235 of the bunko version 
(in 
> the chapter called "Mougeiko Kaishi no Maki").
> 
> Hope that helps. But it really is only a small appearance. I don't 
> know if it would be worth spending all that money on a DVD just for 
a 
> short appearance.
> 
> Tatsuko
>
